channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform 2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform 2

item.title: CVE-2023-50782|2024-08-02T22:23:43.327Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20ansible%20automation%20platform%202
item.description: A flaw was found in the python-cryptography package. This issue may allow a remote attacker to decrypt captured messages in TLS servers that use RSA key exchanges, which may lead to exposure of confidential or sensitive data.
